thread.title: How North Carolina is trying to reshape Medicaid

title: How North Carolina is trying to reshape Medicaid
text:
22 How North Carolina is trying to reshape Medicaid 
Government Health IT: North Carolina is in the process of overhauling its Medicaid program. The governor and state lawmakers are using a mixture of health care models to put the major players -- doctors, hospitals and insurers -- all on the hook to keep rising costs in check.
